duties_responsibilities.duty: Direct and oversee maintenance and operations team, and manage all maintenance and operations services, repairs, renovations, and remodeling efforts.
Plan, direct, and review improvement efforts at each site, including allocating resources and establishing priorities for maintenance projects.
Consult with various project groups, administrators, and stakeholders to advise and meet maintenance and operation service needs.
Develop organization-wide preventive maintenance program for buildings and associated equipment.
Plan, administer budgets, and ensure expenditure control, as well as maintain a detailed inventory database of tools and equipment.
Establish a safe, hazard-free environment for students, staff, and visitors, and ensure compliance with state and federal laws, regulations, and policies.
Attend workshops, professional development, and ongoing training opportunities to stay current with laws, regulations, and policies.

Valid California Driver’s License and insured automobile
